channel.title: Updates: Commercial Fishing Incident Database [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's Commercial Fishing Incident Database request

item.title: Records Published
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On July 8, 2024, the Data Liberation Project published the records received.

item.title: Records Provided
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On May 17, 2024, the CDC provided records in response to this request â€” three spreadsheets and 80 pages of documentation, which the Data Liberation Project has begun reviewing for publication.

item.title: Request Acknowledged, Placed On "Complex" Track, Fees Waived, Estimated Date Of Completion Provided
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On January 30, 2023, HUD emailed a letter ðŸ“„ acknowledging this request, placing it on the agency’s “complex” processing track, agreeing to waive fees, and stating that “[w]e reasonably anticipate that you should receive documents by April 24, 2023.”
